params.defense: none of them. You have a unique defense where you specifically can make up a name and what it can defend against. The host can deny this if it’s _too_ op. Cannot be any defense that exists

fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: -Target a player and choose an attack value

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If that attack is one higher than your target’s defense, you will rampage at their house with that attack
-You can only spawn if @oslonicl is playing
-Oslo can’t be this role

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone but Oslo. You lose if they die
